item.title: ‘I’d hate to turn her over to the state’: My mother, who has dementia, refuses to be put in a facility. What can we do?
item.description: “She has never been willing to sign a power of attorney.”

item.title: ‘I have no retirement savings’: My wife and I are in our 40s. She has an $85K Roth IRA. Is it too late for me?
item.description: “Historically, we’ve been keeping the contribution to her Roth at $50-$200 a month.”

item.title: My uncle’s widow is threatening to sue me. She wants money from my grandmother’s estate. Should I be worried?
item.description: “My uncle said he had recorded my grandmother saying she would change the will and add him as the beneficiary.”

item.title: Crypto bulls were amped for potential solana ETF approvals this week. But the government shutdown threw it into limbo.
item.description: Crypto bulls have been buzzing with anticipation that several major Wall Street firms may win approval to launch exchange-traded funds investing in so...

item.title: ‘I watch antenna TV’: I’m 66. Will I lose my disability benefits if Social Security goes belly up?
item.description: “I read that the Social Security Disability Insurance Trust Fund is good until 2099.”
